Thanks David but I really dont like the spotlight speaker stuff. There are =
several in this group who shine and are better suited for public speaking t=
han I am. Jeff Rezman (Wednesdays nights) and Steve Hultay (Sunday nights) =
have talk shows and Stephen Hill will soon have a new show on Friday nights=
 at paranormaltvnetwork.com so plenty of others to speak to on this topic w=
ho get some great communication.
=C2=A0
Good luck with your shows!
=C2=A0
M=
isty
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0

Cool Jill I will check it out when I get =
time to listen. Its fine its in mp3 format. When group gets too full of the=
 mp3 formats then I will let people know if they have too much up. I usuall=
y suggest if someone wants to upload many files they use esnips.com. Or if =
they want to upload wav files since its not allowed here they can use their=
 free esnips account to do whatever format they wish and host multiple file=
s. Glad ya figured out how to transfer them. I didnt know you didnt know ho=
w. Let us know if you have any problems!
=C2=A0
Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups =
.com, "Jill" <jjkamp@...> wrote:

> So I finally got some motivation and f=
igured out how to get a file from my cassette tape to the computer. It's in=

to protocol):
>

l%27s% 20Ghost%20Box% 20Files/
> 
> I cleaned it up somewhat in Audacity, t=
aking out all the extra radio snippets, so what's left is me asking for som=
eone to say my niece's name, and then the four "Katies" that came after tha=
t. There's even, I think, a fifth Katie tucked in there while I'm asking, a=
s well as the obligatory "I love you" first thing after I've finished askin=
g. 
> 
> Some background: Got my niece and cousin to do a session with me t=
oday. Cousin has been dragging her feet, is skeptical, and the niece just a=
rrived from out of town, is more openminded. I'm pleased we got someone to =
say her name four times in a row, and I'm uploading it here so she can hear=
 it back home. So this isn't the best file I have. Maybe now that I know ho=
w to upload (if it worked), I can upload some of my better session happenin=
gs!
>
